name: date-generator
description: MCP server for generating dates by month, year, and day of week

tools.name: generate_dates
tools.description: Generates all dates in a given month/year that fall on a specific day of the week.

tools.name: nth_occurrence_finder
tools.description: Finds the nth occurrence of a specific day in a month.

tools.name: nth_occurrence_range
tools.description: Find nth occurrence across a range of consecutive months.

tools.name: nth_occurrence_year
tools.description: Find nth occurrence for all 12 months in a year.

tools.name: get_options
tools.description: Returns available months, years, and days of week for selection.
